name: SolarFacts
0:
”Alexa open solar facts”
”Alexa ask solar facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell solar facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: solar facts
des:
Ask for Solar Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

Facts from J provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to enhance your knowledge about space.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Solar Facts" or "Alexa, open Solar Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
